data.title: R.Nageeswari Ramanaidu on LinkedIn: Phakin Chaithanavanich Ph.D. Sakda Ma
data.text:
Job Opportunity: Senior QC Inspector (GI) for Piping Fabrication Work in Songkhla, Thailand We are seeking a qualified Senior QC Inspector (GI) to represent our client for a piping fabrication project in Songkhla, Thailand. Details: Duration: 30-45 days Location: Onshore Singhanakhon District, Songkhla, Thailand Requirements: PCN/CSWIP 3.1 (WI) & 3.4 (RI) Certified or equivalent with BGAS/NACE/SPCC/AMPP or an internationally recognized painting certificate Experience: Familiarity with onshore piping fabrication Minimum 12 years of experience in the oil and gas industry, with at least 10 years as a Welding Inspector and Painting Inspector Note: The position is open to local Thailand Inspectors with valid certificates, available to commence duty at the end of September 2024 or early October 2024. Application Instructions: All applications must be submitted via email to rnagees@ewfgroup.com by 31/8/2024. Interested applicants can also reach the recruiter via WhatsApp at +60127678740 or Line ID: ewfrnagees. #thailandoilandgasjobs #thaiinspectors #thailandoilandgas

Job Title: Graduate Engineer - Business Admin (NDT & Manpower Supply) Location: Kuala Lumpur HQ Industry: Oil & Gas Job Type: Permanent About Us: We are a leading provider of services and solutions in the oil and gas industry, specializing in non-destructive testing (NDT) and manpower supply. With a dedicated team, we are committed to delivering excellence and innovation to our clients across the globe. Our team is our greatest asset, and we believe in nurturing talent and fostering growth within the industry. Position Overview: We are looking for a recent engineering graduate to join our team as a Business Admin in the Business Development Department. This role is an excellent entry point for individuals interested in the administrative and business aspects of the oil and gas industry, particularly in supporting non-destructive testing and manpower supply operations. Key Responsibilities: Conduct market research to identify potential business opportunities in NDT and manpower supply. Conduct cold calls to potential clients and leads to generate new business opportunities. Follow up with clients and leads via email to address inquiries, provide information, and ensure customer satisfaction. Assist in the preparation of tenders, proposals, and quotations for NDT services and manpower contracts. Maintain and update records in the CRM system, ensuring accuracy and compliance with company policies. Provide general administrative support, including managing calendars, organizing meetings, and handling correspondence. Contribute to process improvements and the development of best practices within the departments. Qualifications: Recent graduate with a Degree in Engineering, Business Administration, or a related field. Strong organizational and multitasking abilities. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Proficiency in MS Office and familiarity with CRM software. A keen interest in the oil and gas industry, particularly in NDT and manpower supply. Detail-oriented, proactive, and capable of working independently. Ability to collaborate effectively with various stakeholders. What We Offer: Comprehensive training and mentorship from industry professionals. Opportunities for career growth and development. Exposure to various aspects of the oil and gas industry. A collaborative and supportive work environment. How to Apply: Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and a cover letter to rnagees@ewfgroup.com by 31/8/2024. Please include "Graduate Engineer - Business Admin" in the subject line. #graduateengineer #immediatehiring #businessdevelopment

We are actively #hiring! Know anyone who might be interested? Head of Business Development - (NDT and Manpower Supply Services) Industry Focus: · Oil and Gas · Petrochemical Plant · Marine · Theme Park Key Responsibilities: 1) Strategic Planning and Development 2) Client Relationship Management 3) Team Leadership and Management 4) Market Research and Analysis 5) Sales and Revenue Growth 6) Marketing and Promotion 7) Operational Efficiency 8) Compliance and Safety 9) Financial Management Required Skills and Qualifications: · Educational Background: Bachelor's degree in business administration, Engineering, or a related field. · Experience: Strong sales background, particularly in Non-Destructive Testing (NDT) and Manpower Supply. Proven business development track record in the region, a strong network, and an understanding of the value of maintaining ongoing client relationships after project start-up. Regional and occasional outside region travel required. Please refer to attachment for a detailed job scope and responsibilities. Interested candidates should submit the following documents: 1) An updated CV detailing relevant experience. 2) A cover letter explaining their suitability for the role and motivation for applying. 3) "Please include the job title 'Head of Business Development' in the subject line of your application email to rnagees@ewfgroup.com by 25/8/2024.
